name: stellar
title: Stellar
desc: Freelance effectively with this playful small business template with full i18n capabilities, Keystatic CMS, blog, and more. Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4.
article:
Save weeks of time and have a beautiful small business website and blog running in a snap.

Stellar is the perfect way to showcase a small business. It is a playful and clean theme with many sections to mix-and-match to your liking. It also has a built in blog with categories for engaging with potential customers. Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS, and integrated with Keystatic CMS for easy content editing.

With tons of features to make your life easy:

  • Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Full Internationalization (i18n) capabilities with tons of utility functions, examples, and components
  • Keystatic CMS integration for blog posts, authors, services, and other pages, with a great interface and rich text editor
  • Easy-to-use, with data and config files for important items on the website. You donât have to go digging through thousands of lines of code to change the site title.
  • Over 40 components. Including 5 feature sections, 3 hero sections, 2 services sections, 2 testimonial sections, 2 faq sections, 404, contact, legal, 2 blog indexes, cookie banner, and a blog post layout.
  • Built-in image optimization with Astro.
  • Built-in MDX blog with markdown frontmatter validation, and multiple author support.
  • RSS feed, legal pages, and a cookie banner
  • Scroll-based animations that are easily customizable, or can be disabled with a one-line config change.
  • Boring SEO stuff like OG tags, Twitter cards, and other metadata - already taken care of.
  • View transitions enabled, with a one-line config change to disable.
  • Netlify setup pre-configured to make depoloyment a breeze
  • Responsive - itâs 2024, of course itâs responsive!

Keystatic CMS

Keystatic is included in this theme, allowing non-technical editors to easily edit blog posts, authors, services, and other pages. It is a local / git based CMS so all content still lives in your repo. Donât want to use it? You donât have to! You can easily just write in the MDX pages as normal.
